summoner_id.description: Summoner ID associated with the player

get_summoner_mastery.description: Get a player's total champion mastery score, which is the sum of individual champion mastery levels.

summoner_id.description: Summoner ID associated with the player

get_summoner_masteries.description: Get all champion mastery entries sorted by number of champion points descending.

summoner_id.description: Summoner ID associated with the player

champion_id.description: Champion ID to retrieve the Champion Master for

__metadata__.description: The object contains single Champion Mastery information for player and champion combination.

points_to_level.description: Number of poitns needed to achieve next level. Zero if player reached maximum champion level for this champion.

chest_granted.description: Is chest granted for this champion or not in current season.

last_play_time.description: Last time this champion was played by this player - in Unix milliseconds time format.

champion_level.description: Champion level for specified player and champion combination.

champion_points.description: Total number of champion points for this player and champion combination- they are used to determine championLevel.

points_since_level.description: Number of points earned since current level has been achieved.

tokens_earned.description: The token earned for this champion to levelup.
